description: RDI at 4% desaturation  [(total number of apneas and hypopneas associated with >= 4% desaturation) / (hours of sleep)]
calculations: 60*(hrembp4 + hrop4 + hnrbp4 + hnrop4 + carbp4 + carop4 + canbp4 + canop4 + oarbp4 + oarop4 + oanbp4 + oanop4 + marbp4 + marop4 + manrbp4 + manrop4) / slpprdp
